ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: him to whom I have given great wealth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: whom I have endowed with abundant riches,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and whom I have granted abundant wealth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And then granted him resources in abundance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and appointed for him ample wealth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And then bestowed upon him ample means,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and to whom I have granted resources in abundance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And for whom I appointed wealth extended.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and furnished him with extensive means,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To whom I granted resources in abundance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And then granted him resources in abundance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and designated for him ample wealth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And to whom I granted extensive wealth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:12] and [then] assigned him ample means, abundant and continuous, [generated] from [his] crops, livestock and commerce,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And then) afterwards (bestowed upon him ample means) of all kinds, and his wealth kept increasing until he had in his possession 9,000 measures of silver,
